name: PayLessHere 13 Gallon Trash Can Kitchen Trash Can Automatic Garbage Can with Lid Touch Free High-Capacity Motion Sensor for Kitchen Bedroom Bathroom Office Wateproof Trash Bin (1, Black)
short_description: Smart Motion Sensor : Our trash can uses smart sensing technology to reduce unnecessary openings.Detects hand movement or presence nearby and lifts the lid automatically, making trash disposal more convenient and hygienic. Easy To Clean & Odor Control :All of the components of this kitchen trash can are made of high-quality material, which helps to keep the environment clean and prevents the accumulation of filth, bacteria, and mold.Trash cans with odor-control features trap or neutralize unpleasant odors, leaving the surrounding area feeling fresh and pleasant. High-quality Materials: Made from durable PP plastics, this automatic trash can is waterproof, anti-scratch, and built to last. Its non-toxic and harmless construction ensures safety for home and restaurant use. Perfect for keeping your space clean and hygienic. Power Saving: Equipped with a motion sensor, the trash can operates efficiently with just 4 C-TYPE batteries, allowing for long-term usage without frequent replacements. It's designed to save energy, making it convenient for everyday use. Large Capacity: With a spacious 49 liter (13 gallon) capacity, this garbage can provides ample room for your daily waste disposal needs. Ideal for kitchens, bedrooms, bathrooms, and other areas, it helps manage waste efficiently.

name: Bathroom Trash Can,1.8 Gallon Automatic Garbage Can with Lid for Bathroom Bedroom Kitchen Office,7 Liter Small Touchless Motion Sensor Trash Bins, White
short_description: Smart Sensor Technology: Our automatic trash can adopts advanced sensing technology. When you place your hand above the infrared motion sensor, the lid will remain open and automatically close after 5 seconds of inactivity, providing a convenient touch-free experience Modern Slim Design: Lovewind bathroom trash can, with a capacity of 1.8 gallons, fits snugly into tight spaces while efficiently holding waste. Its stylish design adds a modern touch, making it a great choice for bathroom, bedroom, living room, kitchen IPX5 Waterproof: Our garbage can is equipped with IPX5 waterproof technology. There is no need to worry about water or humidity damaging the sensor device. Made from durable ABS and PP plastics, it is built to last Odorless: Our smart trash can with lid adopts a one-piece bucket design to ensure a completely sealed shell, effectively isolating odors from the garbage and preventing pets from digging through the trash, maintaining a fresh and pleasant indoor environment 2 Opening Modes: Lovewind trash bin can be opened manually or knee sensing, providing a touchless and convenient waste disposal experience. (Powered by 2 AA batteries, not included)

name: NINESTARS CB-DZT-50-13/12-13 Automatic Touchless Infrared Motion Sensor Trash Can Combo Set, 13 Gal 50L & 3 Gal 12L, Stainless Steel Base (Oval, Silver/Black Lid)
short_description: 【High Quality Materials】Water-resistant infrared motion sensor prevents moisture or any accidental spills from damaging the unit. Plus finger-print resistant stainless steel base helps keep the can clean. 【Advanced Technology】 Delay sensing technology preserves battery life and prevents any unnecessary opening from pets, children, or walking by. Soft closing function for longivity of product life. 【Touch-free Motion Sensor Lid Clouser】Seal odor in and eliminate cross-contamination of germs. Requires 3 C and 2 C batteries (not included), Alkaline battery highly recommended for best performance. 【Ease and Convenient】Removable ring liner holds trash bag sturdy in place and prevents bag from overhanging for a neat and clean appearance. Use any standard trash bags or NINESTARS custom trash bags NSTB-13-30 and NSTB-3-30.
product_description: This combo of stainless steel touchless trashcans are designed and engineered by NINESTARS, the world's first legal patent holder. With one kitchen-sized and one bathroom-sized, you can use them in any room you choose, such as the kitchen, office bathroom, dorm room or a kid's room. These two trash cans use the most advanced sensor technology which can be found in all Ninestars trash cans. Pass your hand or debris within ten inches or a 130° angle from the infrared sensor and the lid will automatically open. The lid will remain open if debris or your hand remains within the range of the infrared sensor. After your hand moves away from the lid, it will close automatically. Each can includes a ring liner to keep trash bag from public view for a neat and clean appearance.

name: TIPGO Automatic Motion Sensor Bathroom Trash Can with Lid, 2.6 Gallon Touchless Trash Bin, Smart Garbage Can Plastic Slim Wastebasket for Bedroom, Office, Dorm (Black)
short_description: 【Touchless Trash Can】Adopts advanced infrared technology. The lid opens when your hand or any object is detected in the sensing area, eliminating the need for direct contact, particularly beneficial for individuals with mobility challenges. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included) 【Perfect for Narrow Spaces】The slim design of our smart trash can make it ideal for small spaces, fitting perfectly into corners and narrow areas in office, bedroom and bathroom, etc. Get it now to improve the space utilization! 【Prevents Spreading of Odors】The lid fits perfectly to the mouth of the trash can, avoids garbage exposure, and contains all odors, keeping your room clean and fresh 【Removable Fix Ring】The Removable inner fix ring help hold garbage bag in place and prevents bag from overhanging the trash can, maintaining a neat appearance, and easy to put in and take out 【Countdown Light】If your hand stays in the sensing area, the green light is always on and the lid remains open. When the hand is removed, the green light starts flashing and the lid closes automatically after 5 seconds

product_description: This 13 Gal Stainless Steel touchless trash can is designed and engineered by NINESTARS, the world's first legal patent holder. With its sleek oval fingerprint-resistant design, it can be used in almost any place, such as the home, office, kitchen, bedroom, dorm room or a kid's room. This durable trash can uses the most advanced sensor technology which can be found in all Ninestars trash cans. Pass your hand or debris within ten inches or a 130° angle from the infrared sensor and the lid will automatically open. The lid will remain open if debris or hand remains within the range of the infrared sensor. Three seconds after your hand moves away from the lid, it will close automatically. Power lasts up to 6 months in normal daily usage. It includes a ring liner to keep trash bag from public view for a neat and clean appearance. Please note: The older version of this model accepted 4 D batteries but has been since discontinued. This model requires 3 C batteries to perform. (not included)

name: simplehuman 45 Liter / 12 Gallon Semi-Round Automatic Sensor Trash Can, Brushed Stainless Steel
short_description: MOTION SENSOR - Infrared fields sense the areas above and in front of the can so it opens automatically with just the wave of your hand. FAST, SMOOTH AND WHISPER-QUIET - A precision motor and planetary gear system produces smooth, steady power — and you won't hear a thing. NEAT AND EASY - The outer lid lifts up for easy access to the liner — no need to remove the top of the can or fumble with a bucket. When you're done, it closes over the liner to keep it neatly out of sight. LINER POCKET - Keep liners where you need them. Dispense them one by one — no perforations or unraveling — from inside the can for a faster liner change. CLEANER STAINLESS STEEL - simplehuman's invisible silver-ion coating resists fingerprints and the spread of germs without dulling the natural sheen and luster of the steel.
product_description: The simplehuman touch-free semi-round sensor bin opens automatically with just a wave of your hand so throwing rubbish away is quick, efficient and hassle-free. It has a motion sensor that is smart enough to adapt to you and the surrounding environment – no false triggers, no unexpected lid closures. This bin also features our innovative 'liner pocket,' which stores and dispenses liners from inside the bin for a faster liner change. The liner rim lifts up for easy access to the liner, then closes to grip and keep it neatly out of sight. An invisible nano-silver clear coat protects stainless steel from fingerprints and germs. The simplehuman code J liner refill packs store perfectly in this bin's liner pocket.

name: EKO Mirage-X 47 Liter / 12.4 Gallon Touchless Rectangular Motion Sensor Trash Can with Removable Liner, Brushed Stainless Steel Finish
short_description: PREMIUM MOTION SENSOR TECHNOLOGY - Experience the smoothest, most seamless lid opening and closing technology with this EKO hands-free automatic trash can. ULTIMATE FINGERPRINT RESISTANCE - Say goodbye to smudges and hello to a clean flawless exterior that stays immaculate. The anti-fingerprint stainless steel finish keeps your space clean and stylish. SLEEK AND DURABLE FINISH - Meticulously crafted with a stainless steel finish, this stylish touchless trash can offers a cool and smooth texture that’s durable and visually appealing for any home decor style. LONG-LASTING POWER - Use with 6 AA alkaline batteries and can last up to 8 months of use, making our kitchen garbage can eco-friendly and your wallet happy. STAY OPEN AND DO YOUR THING - Just a touch of the button and the lid will stay open, lending you a hand during those big cleaning sessions. No rush, no fuss.

SMART SENSOR - Our fully-developed sensing technology reduces unnecessary openings and extends battery life. The lid stays open if you keep your hands above the infrared motion sensor, which improves user experience greatly. Lid closes after 5 seconds automatically if none movement is detected by sensor. Product powered by 2 AA batteries (not included). MEASUREMENT - 11''L×7''W×12''H, 2 Gallons, ABS materials. WATER-RESISTANT - Advanced IPX5 waterproof technology prevents water or humid environment from damaging the unit. Leaving none water stain on surface after rinse. STYLISH & UNIQUE DESIGN - The appearance of this product is equipped with novel wave stripes, bringing visual aesthetics along with being anti-slip. With its modern oval-shaped design, the commercial trash can turns out to be great in bathroom, kitchen and other rooms while taking up less space. TRASH BAG FIX RING - The removable trash bag fixed liner supports trash bags to hold heavier waste. Simply take out the liner and put a trash bag on it to keep the trash bag hidden inside. CUSTOM FIT GARBAGE BAGS: Our code A trash bags are designed to fit perfectly in this trash can so they don't slip and are completely hidden. The extra thick plastic and double stitched construction prevents tears and breakage.
